briefTitle: Regional Prophylactic Vancomycin in Revision Total Knee Replacement

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Revision total knee arthroplasty
* Informed consent given

Exclusion Criteria:

* Current treatment with IV Vancomycin within the preceding 7 days
* Previous hypersensitivity to vancomycin
* Significant cardiac or respiratory abnormality
* Contraindications to using the intraosseous vascular access system (EZ-IO)
* Sepsis

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Concentration of Vancomycin in Subcutaneous Fat
outcomeMeasures.description: During the procedure, subcutaneous fat samples (approximately 0.5 cm\^3) were taken at regular intervals until skin closure. Vancomycin concentrations were determined by liquid chromatography coupled with tandem mass spectrometry. Times are given as minutes post surgical incision.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Concentration of Vancomycin in Bone Samples
outcomeMeasures.description: During the procedure, bone samples (approximately 0.5 cm\^3) were taken at regular intervals were taken at regular intervals until skin closure. All bone samples were taken from the femur, distant from the tibial intraosseous injection site. Vancomycin concentrations were determined by liquid chromatography coupled with tandem mass spectrometry. Times are given as minutes post surgical incision.
